info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 2:34PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Eddy and western Lea Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 234 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles north of Avalon, or 17 miles southeast of Artesia, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lea County Zip Franklin Memorial Airport and Loco Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southeastern New Mexico.
